sen.j: 三宅藤九郎（みやけ とうくろう）は、狂言の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: Tokuro MIYAKE is one family name given to Kyogen performers.
Tokuro MIYAKE is one family name given to Kyogen performers.
Tokuro MIYAKE is one family name given to Kyogen performers.

sen.j: 三宅家の成り立ちについては、狂言の項を参照。
sen.e: Refer to Kyogen page, regaring the formation of the Miyake family.
Refer to Kyogen page, regarding the formation of the Miyake family.
Refer to Kyogen page, regarding the formation of the Miyake family.

sen.j: 山脇家・野村又三郎家とともに「和泉流」を創流した（宗家は山脇家）。
sen.e: Along with the Yamawaki family and the Matasaburo Nomura family, the Miyake family established 'Izumi school' (the head family is the Yamawaki family).
Along with the Yamawaki family and the Matasaburo NOMURA family, the Miyake family established 'Izumi school' (the head family is the Yamawaki family).
Along with the Yamawaki family and the Matasaburo NOMURA family, the Miyake family established 'Izumi school' (the head family is the Yamawaki family).

sen.j: 拠点は金沢市。
sen.e: Their base is in Kanazawa city.
Their base is in Kanazawa City.
Their base is in Kanazawa City.

sen.j: 現在第一線で活躍している野村萬斎、野村万蔵らは三宅家の弟子家である野村家の出身である。
sen.e: Manzai NOMURA and Manzo NOMURA, who have been active in the front lines, are from the Nomura family, a deciple family of the Miyake family's.
Mansai NOMURA and Manzo NOMURA, who have been active in the front lines, are from the Nomura family, a disciple family of the Miyake family's.
sen.cmt: discipleスペル訂正しました。Mansai NOMURAに訂正しました。
sen.e: Mansai NOMURA and Manzo NOMURA, who have been active in the front lines, are from the Nomura family, a disciple family of the Miyake family's.

sen.j: 大政奉還の煽りで各派が衰退していくなか、ひとり気を吐いていた五世野村万造が次男に師家の名跡を継がせて再興した。
sen.e: While other schools declined owing to Taisei Hokan (transfer of power back to the Emperor), the fifth Manzo NOMURA, who wouldn't easily to his surrounding, reestablished the Miyake family, his mentor family, by making his second son succeeding to that name.

While other schools declined owing to Taisei Hokan (transfer of power back to the Emperor), the fifth Manzo NOMURA, who wouldn't easily to his surrounding, reestablished the Miyake family, his mentor family, by making his second son succeeding to that name.

While other schools declined owing to Taisei Hokan (transfer of power back to the Emperor), the fifth Manzo NOMURA, who wouldn't easily to his surrounding, reestablished the Miyake family, his mentor family, by making his second son succeeding to that name.

sen.j: （生年不詳 - 宝永5年（1708年））。
sen.e: (birth year unknown - 1708).
(year of birth unknown - 1708).
sen.cmt: year of birth unknown用語統一リストより訂正しました。
sen.e: (year of birth unknown - 1708).

sen.j: 三宅惣三郎家の養子。
sen.e: He was adopted to the Sozaburo MIYAKE family.
He was adopted to the Sozaburo MIYAKE family.
He was adopted to the Sozaburo MIYAKE family.

sen.j: 九世三宅藤九郎（七世三宅庄市）
sen.e: The ninth Tokuro MIYAKE (the seventh Shoichi MIYAKE)
The ninth Tokuro MIYAKE (the seventh Shoichi MIYAKE)
The ninth Tokuro MIYAKE (the seventh Shoichi MIYAKE)
(March 18, 1901- December 19,1990).
(March 18, 1901 - December 19, 1990).
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。
sen.e: (March 18, 1901 - December 19, 1990).

sen.j: 和泉流狂言師。
sen.e: He was Kyogen performer of Izumi school.
He was Kyogen performer of Izumi school.
He was Kyogen performer of Izumi school.

sen.j: 重要無形文化財保持者（人間国宝）。
sen.e: He was a holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Tresure).
He was a holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).
He was a holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).

sen.j: 東京都出身。
sen.e: He was from Tokyo.
He was from Tokyo.
He was from Tokyo.

sen.j: 野村万蔵の次男。
sen.e: He was Manzo NOMURA's second son.
He was Manzo NOMURA's second son.
He was Manzo NOMURA's second son.

sen.j: 六世野村万蔵の弟。
sen.e: He was a brother of the sixth Manzo NOMURA.
He was a brother of the sixth Manzo NOMURA.
He was a brother of the sixth Manzo NOMURA.

sen.j: 初名・野村万介。
sen.e: His first name was Mansuke NOMURA.
His first name was Mansuke NOMURA.
His first name was Mansuke NOMURA.

sen.j: 歌舞伎で初めて女の名題となった尾上菊枝と結婚した。
sen.e: He married Kikushi ONOE, who was the first female chief actress in Kabuki.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: He married Kikue ONOE, who was the first female chief actress in Kabuki.
He married Kikue ONOE, who was the first female chief actress in Kabuki.

sen.j: 夫婦で三宅家へ養子に入り、九代目三宅藤九郎を継いだ。
sen.e: The couple was adopted into the Miyake family and Mansuke became Tokuro MIYAKE, the 9th.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: The couple was adopted into the Miyake family and Mansuke became Tokuro MIYAKE, the 9th.
The couple was adopted into the Miyake family and Mansuke became Tokuro MIYAKE, the 9th.

sen.j: 息子に和泉元秀（和泉流十九世宗家。旧名三宅保之）と三宅右近がいる。
sen.e: His sons are the 13th Soke Motohide IZUMI (his former name was Yasuyuki MIYAKE) and Ukon MIYAKE.
His sons are the 13th Soke Motohide IZUMI (his former name was Yasuyuki MIYAKE) and Ukon MIYAKE.
His sons are the 13th Soke Motohide IZUMI (his former name was Yasuyuki MIYAKE) and Ukon MIYAKE.

sen.j: 狂言の研究家としても名を成し、『ぼうふり』を始めとする新作狂言を多数作り、また上演されなくなった狂言の復曲も行った。
sen.e: Tokuro MIYAKE became famous as a Kyogen researcher, made a lot of new Kyogen scripts, including "Bofuri (stick waving)", and discovered and performed old Kyogen plays that had not been performed for a while.

Tokuro MIYAKE became famous as a Kyogen researcher, made a lot of new Kyogen scripts, including "Bofuri" (stick waving), and discovered and performed old Kyogen plays that had not been performed for a while.
sen.cmt: 括弧の位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: Tokuro MIYAKE became famous as a Kyogen researcher, made a lot of new Kyogen scripts, including "Bofuri" (stick waving), and discovered and performed old Kyogen plays that had not been performed for a while.

sen.j: その業績を評価され、人間国宝に認定される。
sen.e: His accomplishment was highly evaluated and he was designated as Living National Treasure.
His accomplishment was highly evaluated and he was designated as Living National Treasure.
His accomplishment was highly evaluated and he was designated as Living National Treasure.

sen.j: 1989年に隠居して七世三宅庄市を襲名。
sen.e: In 1989 Tokuro retired and succeeded to the stage name of the seventh Shoichi MIYAKE.
In 1989 Tokuro retired and succeeded to the stage name of the seventh Shoichi MIYAKE.
In 1989 Tokuro retired and succeeded to the stage name of the seventh Shoichi MIYAKE.

sen.j: 出版物
sen.e: Publication
Publication

sen.j: 「狂言師・三宅藤九郎」（映画）
sen.e: "Kyogen performer, Tokuro MIYAKE" (a movie)

sen.j: 十世三宅藤九郎（三宅祥子 旧名・山脇祥子）
sen.e: The tenth Tokuro MIYAKE (Shoko MIYAKE, whose former name was Shoko YAMAWAKI).
The tenth Tokuro MIYAKE (Shoko MIYAKE, whose former name was Shoko YAMAWAKI).
The tenth Tokuro MIYAKE (Shoko MIYAKE, whose former name was Shoko YAMAWAKI).

sen.j: 能楽和泉流狂言方。
sen.e: Nogaku (No music) Izumiryu kyogenkata (comic actors of Izumi school).
Noh gaku (Noh music) Izumiryu kyogenkata (comic actors of Izumi school).
sen.cmt: Nohに訂正しました。スペース補足しました。
sen.e: Noh gaku (Noh music) Izumiryu kyogenkata (comic actors of Izumi school).

sen.j: 東京都出身。
sen.e: She is from Tokyo.
She is from Tokyo.
She is from Tokyo.

sen.j: 十九世和泉流宗家和泉元秀の次女。
sen.e: She is the second daughter of the nineteenth Motohide IZUMI of Izumi-ryu soke (the head family of the Izumi school).
She is the second daughter of the nineteenth Motohide IZUMI of Izumi-ryu soke (the head family of the Izumi school).
She is the second daughter of the nineteenth Motohide IZUMI of Izumi-ryu soke (the head family of the Izumi school).

sen.j: 青山学院初等科〜大学卒。
sen.e: She studied at Aoyama Gakuin school, from elementary course through university.
She studied at Aoyama Gakuin school, from elementary course through university.
She studied at Aoyama Gakuin school, from elementary course through university.

sen.j: 姉は和泉淳子、弟は和泉元彌、母は和泉節子。
sen.e: Her elder sister is Junko IZUMI, her younger brother Motoya IZUMI and their mother is Setsuko IZUMI.
Her older sister is Junko IZUMI, her younger brother Motoya IZUMI and their mother is Setsuko IZUMI.
Her older sister is Junko IZUMI, her younger brother Motoya IZUMI and their mother is Setsuko IZUMI.

sen.j: テレビ出演する際は姉・淳子とセットであることが多く、「姉ズ」などと言われている。
sen.e: When she appears on TV, she is often with her sister, Junko, and they are called 'Izumi sisters.'
When she appears on TV, she is often with her sister, Junko, and they are called 'Izumi sisters.'
When she appears on TV, she is often with her sister, Junko, and they are called 'Izumi sisters.'

sen.j: 狂言ファンからは「姉ズの元秀師に顔が似ていない方」とも。
sen.e: Some Kyogen admirers call her 'the daughter who doesn't look like Motohide.'
Some Kyogen admirers call her 'the daughter who doesn't look like Motohide.'
Some Kyogen admirers call her 'the daughter who doesn't look like Motohide.'

sen.j: 九世三宅藤九郎死去後、誰もが九世の次男・三宅右近が継ぐ物と思っていた名跡を17歳で襲名。
sen.e: After the ninth Shoichi MIYAKE passed away, everyone expected Shoichi's second son, Ukon Miyake would succeed to the name but Shoko succeeded to it at the age of seventeen.
After the ninth Tokuro MIYAKE passed away, everyone expected the ninth Tokuro's second son, Ukon MIYAKE would succeed to the name but Shoko succeeded to it at the age of seventeen.
sen.cmt: Tokuro MIYAKEに訂正しました。MIYAKE大文字にしました。
sen.e: After the ninth Tokuro MIYAKE passed away, everyone expected the ninth Tokuro's second son, Ukon MIYAKE would succeed to the name but Shoko succeeded to it at the age of seventeen.

sen.j: 物議を醸した（和泉家側は「九世が指名した」と主張したが、現在でも異論を唱えるものが多い）。
sen.e: It became controversial (although the Izumi family claimed that the 9th had appointed her, many are still against her succession.)
It became controversial (although the Izumi family claimed that the ninth had appointed her, many are still against her succession.)
It became controversial (although the Izumi family claimed that the ninth had appointed her, many are still against her succession.)

sen.j: 三宅藤九郎の名は、祥子が商標登録しているが、九世死去の3年前に出願されていた。
sen.e: The name of Tokuro MIYAKE was registered as a trademark by Shoko and the registeration was applied three years before the death of the ninth.
The name of Tokuro MIYAKE was registered as a trademark by Shoko and the registration was applied three years before the death of the ninth.
The name of Tokuro MIYAKE was registered as a trademark by Shoko and the registration was applied three years before the death of the ninth.

sen.j: 1995年、父・元秀没後は、ほとんど能楽界と隔絶した場で、姉・和泉淳子、弟・和泉元彌の3人で活動していた。
sen.e: After their father Motohide passed away in 1995, Shoko was active with her sister, Junko and brother Motoya almost in isolation from 'Nogaku' ('No' music) world.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: After their father Motohide passed away in 1995, Shoko was active with her sister, Junko and brother Motoya almost in isolation from 'Noh gaku' ('Noh' music) world.
sen.cmt: Nohに訂正しました。スペース補足しました。
sen.e: After their father Motohide passed away in 1995, Shoko was active with her sister, Junko and brother Motoya almost in isolation from 'Noh gaku' ('Noh' music) world.

sen.j: が、和泉元彌の能楽協会退会後は他の能楽師との共演はなくなった。
sen.e: After Motoya IZUMI withdrew from Association for Japanese Noh Plays, Motoya and his sisters have had few opportunities to perform with other 'No' performers.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: After Motoya IZUMI withdrew from Association for Japanese Noh Plays, Motoya and his sisters have had few opportunities to perform with other 'Noh' performers.
After Motoya IZUMI withdrew from Association for Japanese Noh Plays, Motoya and his sisters have had few opportunities to perform with other 'Noh' performers.

sen.j: 正規の公演は難しくなり、間狂言を演じることはない。
sen.e: It is difficult for them to give normal performances and they have no chance to play 'Ai kyogen', (comic interlude in Noh).
It is difficult for them to give normal performances and they have no chance to play 'Ai kyogen' (comic interlude in Noh).
It is difficult for them to give normal performances and they have no chance to play 'Ai kyogen' (comic interlude in Noh).
